content:
Hi, is there a client app for clinical data, similar to what we have for plan-net provider directory API
https://plan-net-client.herokuapp.com/
please move it to the right stream, sorry, could not find appropriate one for clinical related questions
thanks
There are many apps that get and manage clinical data - see https://myhealthapplication.com/health-apps/gallery
. . .but they are not example apps, they are real production ones
